notes: base lemma; mass noun often used collectively

example_sentence_italian: Ho comprato una verdura al mercato.
example_sentence_english: I bought a vegetable at the market.

notes: can refer to vegetables in general
partitive plural form; also contraction of di + le
example_sentence_english: I would like some vegetables, please.

example_sentence_italian: Il sapore della verdura è buono.
example_sentence_english: The flavor of the vegetable is good.
The flavor comes from the vegetable.
There is dirt in the vegetable.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato un insetto nelle verdure.
example_sentence_english: I found an insect in the vegetables.
Put the cheese on the vegetable.
Sprinkle the dressing on the vegetables.

notes: no contraction; written as two words
example_sentence_italian: Prepara il sugo con la verdura.
example_sentence_english: Prepare the sauce with the vegetable.

notes: no contraction; written as two words
example_sentence_english: I make a salad with the vegetables.
